drawida jathika sandhanaye (ti. en. ee.) hawulkaruwaku wana ilankeyi thamil arasu kachchi namathi pakshaya shri lankawa thula wenama rajyayak bihikirime aramunak da athiwa pihituwa gath deshapalana pakshayak yayi thindu prakashayak nikuth karannayi illa shreshtadhikaranayata pethsamak gonu kara atha.shri lankawa thula wenama rajyayak pihitu wimata ho ee sandaha kisidu aakarayakin sahayogaya nodimata aandukrama wyawasthawe 6 wani waganthiyata anuwa sama purawasiyaku bandi ...
